entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM AST Tuesday 31 January 2023
